tooltip.nekoweapon.sword_of_judgment.too: If the target's health is less than twice the attack power of the weapon, it will be executed directly.
tooltip.nekoweapon.gan_jiang.tooltip0: Probability of killing the target in seconds when holding [Mo Ye] in the secondary hand
tooltip.nekoweapon.mo_ye.tooltip0: Probability of killing the target in seconds when holding [Gan Jiang] in the secondary hand
tooltip.nekoweapon.zen_stick.tooltip0: Apply [Yan Ling] effect to non-undead creatures.
tooltip.nekoweapon.zen_stick.tooltip1: Apply [Chao Du] effect to undead creatures
tooltip.nekoweapon.mahogany_sword.toolti: If you have a [Yellow Fu] in your secondary hand, you can deal extra damage to zombies.
tooltip.nekoweapon.adaptive_armor.toolti: immune to damage whose source is itself.
No other damage taken will exceed 35% of current life value, reduced to a minimum of 3 points, gains 30s invulnerability on near-death, will not die during that time, cooldown 160 seconds.
tooltip.nekoweapon.natural_armor.tooltip: Increases lifesteal by 10 points, and lifesteal is slowly restored.
tooltip.nekoweapon.red_lotus_armor.toolt: Applies out damage to the attacker. It also attaches a Karma Fire effect.
Attacking a target with a Karma Fire status mends itself.
tooltip.nekoweapon.stance_armor.tooltip0: Reduces damage outside of your own touch distance by 80%.
tooltip.nekoweapon.stance_armor.tooltip1: Increases damage within touch distance by 70%.
tooltip.nekoweapon.warlord_armor.tooltip: The lower the lifesteal, the higher the damage. Increases damage by up to 75%.
Will not be spiked when full of life, will be reduced to 3 points of blood and immune to this death with a cooldown of 100 seconds.
